jathika rohale nawa snayu shalya prathikara eekakayaoluwa beragannabari wu ayagejiwithaya bera denalokayema athi wishala rohalak lesa salakena kolambaa jathika rohale ikuth da wiwrutha wu nawa snayu shalya ha prathikara (niyuro troma) eekakaya rohal ithihasayata ekwanne nawinathama pahasukam sahitha andan 300 samanwitha madhyasthanayak lesaya.esema ema madhyasthanaye wenath kisidu rohalaka nathi nawathama pahasukam sahitha andan 60 kin samanwitha dadi sathkara eekakayak da pihituwa thibe.hadisi anathurakin hisata siduwana barapathala thuwala nisa roginge jiwitha anathure watunada ema madhyasthanaye athi nawina pahasukam nisa ewani ayage jiwitha bera ganimata wadi idakada thibe.sawudi aramudala saha shri lanka rajaye samuhika mulya dhana parithyagaye rupiyal miliyana 3000 k waya kota mahal dahayakin samanwithawa idikaranu lada ema nawa madhyasthanaya janatha ayithiyata pawaradima ikuthda (31) mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithuma athin sidu karini.snayu shalya prathikara eekakaya wiwrutha kirimata pamini mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithuma ehi wattu nirikshanaya kala ayurunawa snayu ha shalya ha prathikara eekakaya hisata siduwana anathuruwalata ha susumnayuwata siduwana anathuru saha aabadhawalata prathikara labadima sandaha pamanakma sewa salasayi.jathika rohale ema nawa eekakayata rogiyaku kelinma athulath kara ganimak sidu nokere.marga anathuru, usin watena anathuru ha kala kolahala nisa athi kara ganna gatumwaladi siduwana thuwala nisa dainikawa kolambaa menma kolambain pita pradeshawala sitada hadisi anathuru anshayata rogin sahena pirisak athulath karayi.ehidi rogiyata siduwi athi thuwala ha eewaye barapathala thaththwaya anuwa kala yuthu prathikara ha sathkam pilibanda waidya parikshawedi thiranaya kere.hisata saha susumnayuwata barapathala hani siduwi thibe nam hadisi anathuru anshaye snayu anshaye laba dun prathikara sewawa pramanawath nowe nam nawa anshaya wetha yomu kirima dan sidu weyi.hadisi anathuru anshaye shalya ansha dekak pawathuna da nawa snayu shalya ha prathikara madhyasthanaye andan 300 ida pahasukam ha eyata athulath karana roginge sathkam sandaha shalyagara 8 k pihituwa thibe.
anthime eyage nadayo ekka ekathuwela mawa angoda manasika rohale nawaththuwa‚Ä¶

ejapa janapathi apekshakaya sajith - mawbima kiyayi me athara 'irida mawbima' puwathpatha wartha kara aththe, elambaena janadhipathiwaranayedi podu apekshakayek path kirimen baharawa eksath jathika pakshaye apekshakaya washayen ema pakshaye niyojya nayaka sajith premadasa mahatha path kala yuthu bawata e.ja.pa.ye manthriwarun bahutharayak idiripath kara athi yojanawa agamathi ranil wikramasinha mahatha piligena athi bawayi. e.ja.pa. niyojya nayaka sajith premadasa mahatha idiri janadhipathiwaranayedi janadhipathi apekshakaya lesa idiripath kala yuthu bawata e.ja.pa. manthriwaru bahutharayak menma e.ja.pa. kruthyadhikari mandalaye samajikayan pirisak da idiripath kara athi yojanawata agamathi ranil wikramasinha ekangathwaya pala kara athayi e.ja.pa. jeyashta amathiwarayek pawasu bawa 'mawbima' warthawe sandahan we.
